attributes.action: Re-instate/reopen all military Hospitals as a matter of greatest urgency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you really want to make your mark in a very, very positive way, PLEASE, PLEASE reinstate/reopen Military Hospitals NOW.  It is the very least we can do for the men sent in UK's name to fight a war not of our making. Wounds can and do heal, but a shattered mind never does. We owe these men nothing less than the best care they can get and at the moment they are NOT getting this. PLEASE PLEASE let your final act be this most memorable of all, reopen the Military Hospitals NOW.  Mrs.Rena Blight. 9 Scar View Road, OXENHOLME, KENDAL LA9 7EU   01539 723793

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
